- What changed?
- Why is this needed?

## Checklist
- [ ] PR title follows Conventional Commits (`feat:`, `fix:`, `chore:`, ...)
- [ ] Linked issue / task is referenced
- [ ] Unit tests added or updated
- [ ] Contract tests added or updated (if integrations changed)
- [ ] Docs/runbooks updated where relevant
- [ ] No secrets committed

- Risk level: low / medium / high

## Deployment Notes
- Requires migration: yes / no
- Requires feature flag: yes / no
